Sections Settings

Carousel#

  1. Add Image

    1. Select image
    2. Caption heading - title
    3. Caption heading size - H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6 (Learn more)
    4. Caption content - subtitle
    5. Button URL - select link to theme page or remove it (Leave empty to disable)
    6. Button text
    7. Button color - white, light, dark, primary, secondary
    8. Button size - small, normal, large

  2. Settings

    1. Background color - white, light, dark, primary, secondary, carbon effect, gradient (set below)
    2. Background gradient - Paste your CSS gradient code from sources like [uiGradients] (https://uigradients.com/)

  3. Carousel settings

    1. Show Controls- toggle prev/next buttons
    2. Show Indicators - toggle small dots at the bottom
    3. Autoplay time
    4. Transition effect - Learn more about Animate.css
    5. Transition speed

  4. Image

    1. Image aspect ratio - something like image size (Recommended values are between '0.3' to '0.5')
    2. Image Minimum Height (px) - Useful for mobile view

  5. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Margin top
    2. Margin bottom

YMM Bar#

  1. Settings

    1. Background image
    2. Title
    3. Subtitle
    4. Title size - H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6
    5. Wrap in container

  2. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Margin top
    2. Margin bottom

Shop by#

  1. Content

    1. Collection
    2. Brand

  2. Settings

    1. Wrap in container
    2. Show products counts in collections
    3. Image width (px)
    4. Image height (px)
    5. Collections per row / Mobile
    6. Collections per row / Table
    7. Collections per row / Desktop

  3. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Margin top
    2. Margin bottom

Top Categories#

  1. Collection

  2. Settings

    1. Title
    2. Subtitle
    3. Light background - changes background color from blue to grey
    4. Title alignment - left, center, right
    5. Wrap in container

  3. Carousel settings

    1. Show Controls - toggle prev/next buttons
    2. Show Indicators - toggle small dots at the bottom
    3. Autoplay time
    4. Transition effect - Learn more about Animate.css
    5. Transition speed

  4. Items settings

    1. Image width (px)
    2. Image height (px)
    3. Items per row / Mobile
    4. Items per row / Table
    5. Items per row / Desktop

  5. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Padding top
    2. Padding bottom
    3. Margin top
    4. Margin bottom

Banners#

  1. Banner

    1. Select image
    2. Image width (px)
    3. Image height (px)
    4. Content - banner text
    5. Button URL - select link to theme page or remove it (Leave empty to disable)
    6. Button text
    7. Button color - white, light, dark, primary, secondary

  2. Settings

    1. Wrap in container
    2. Banners per row / Mobile
    3. Banners per row / Table
    4. Banners per row / Desktop

  3. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Margin top
    2. Margin bottom

Testimonials#

  1. Testimonail

    1. Select product
    2. Title
    3. Description
    4. Date
    5. Customer name
    6. Customer description - ordered from
    7. Customer photo

  2. Settings

    1. Background color - white, light, dark, primary, secondary, carbon effect, gradient (set below)
    2. Background gradient - Paste your CSS gradient code from sources like [uiGradients] (https://uigradients.com/)
    3. Title
    4. Subtitle
    5. Title alignment - left, center, right
    6. Wrap in container

  3. Carousel settings

    1. Show Controls - toggle prev/next buttons
    2. Show Indicators - toggle small dots at the bottom
    3. Autoplay time
    4. Transition effect - Learn more about Animate.css
    5. Transition speed

  4. Image

    1. Customer photo circle
    2. Customer photo size (px)

  5. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Padding top
    2. Padding bottom
    3. Margin top
    4. Margin bottom

Featured collection#

  1. Collection

  2. Settings

    1. Title
    2. Subtitle
    3. Light background - changes background color from white to grey
    4. Title alignment - left, center, right

  3. Product list

    1. Wrap in container
    2. Wishlist icon on products
    3. Products limit
    4. Products per row / Mobile
    5. Products per row / Table
    6. Products per row / Desktop

  4. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Padding top
    2. Padding bottom
    3. Margin top
    4. Margin bottom

Blog section#

  1. Blog

  2. Settings

    1. Title
    2. Subtitle
    3. Light background - changes background color from blue to grey
    4. Title alignment - left, center, right
    5. Wrap in container

  3. Blog post list

    1. Image width (px)
    2. Image height (px)
    3. Show authors
    4. Show dates
    5. Show comments
    6. Show excerpts
    7. Excerpts length - The maximum number of characters for the post excerpt
    8. Show readmore button
    9. Products limit
    10. Posts per row / Mobile
    11. Posts per row / Table
    12. Posts per row / Desktop

  4. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Padding top
    2. Padding bottom
    3. Margin top
    4. Margin bottom

Brands#

  1. Image

  2. Settings

    1. Title
    2. Title size - H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6
    3. Wrap in container
    4. Image Height (px)

  3. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Margin top
    2. Margin bottom

Separator#

  1. Wrap in container

  2. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Margin top (range)
    2. Margin bottom (range)

Featured Product#

  1. Content (additional information)

  2. Settings

    1. Section Title
    2. Product
    3. Product title small font - Recommended if your product titles are long
    4. Show vendor
    5. Show quantity
    6. Show payment icons
    7. Show social sharing
    8. Show tags

  3. Image gallery

    1. Show Controls - toggle prev/next buttons
    2. Show Indicators - toggle small dots at the bottom
    3. Transition effect - Learn more about Animate.css
    4. Thumbnails per row

  4. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)

    1. Margin top
    2. Margin bottom

Instagram embed (not working yet)#

  1. Instagram username
  2. Title
  3. Posts count
  4. Wrap in container
  5. Show likes
  6. Show comments
  7. Light background - changes background color from white to grey
  8. Thumbnail size - small, medium, large
  9. Spacing (Based on Bootstrap spacing utility classes Learn more)
    1. Padding top
    2. Padding bottom
    3. Margin top
    4. Margin bottom
